wikipedia_page.main: Riccardo Calder (born 26 January 1996) is an English professional footballer who currently plays for National League North side Kettering Town.  Calder is a product of the Aston Villa academy but did not break into their first team following loan spells at Dundee, Doncaster Rovers and Lincoln City. Calder represented England internationally at Under-17 level.

Harper impressed Inverness manager John Robertson during a friendly game with Nairn County in August 2017. He made his league debut for Inverness on 13 March 2018 against Dunfermline Athletic as a late replacement for Riccardo Calder, but was himself injured in the 7th minute of play.Inverness Courier
*8 November 2018: Riccardo Calder is kicked out of the club after being found guilty of assault in Birmingham after the end of the previous season.
